[recIndex] (https://github.com/johnnybender/adastandards2016/blob/master/index/recIndex.md)

### **If a patientâ€™s response to weight loss medications is <5% weight loss after 3 months or if there are any safety or tolerability issues at any time, the medication should be discontinued and alternative medications or treatment approaches should be considered.**
* Unique ID: rec119
* Evidence Letter: A
* Category Name: PHARMACOTHERAPY
* Page: S58
* Feasible: Yes
* Type: Rec
* Comments: All patients with diabetes; Challenging to calculate and use deltas in Wellcentive
